Sentencas: Oxide-ion and proton conductors have a variety of applications such as solid-oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Oxide-ion and proton conductivity of the ordered perovskite BaY1/3Ga2/3O2.5

Sentencas: Here we report BaY1/3Ga2/3O2.5 as a new structural-type mixed oxide-ion and proton conductor.
Titulo: Oxide-ion and proton conductivity of the ordered perovskite BaY1/3Ga2/3O2.5

Sentencas: Rietveld refinement of neutron-diffraction data indicated that BaY1/3Ga2/3O2.5 is a Ga/Y-cation- and O/V-VO(x)-anion-ordered perovskite-related oxide with the large amount of 'intrinsic oxygen vacancy' V-VO(x) (16.7%), which was supported by bondvalance sums (BVSs) and ab initio DFT structural optimization.
Titulo: Oxide-ion and proton conductivity of the ordered perovskite BaY1/3Ga2/3O2.5

Sentencas: Temperature and oxygen partial pressure dependencies of electrical conductivity of BaY1/3Ga2/3O2.5 in dry and wet atmospheres indicated that this compound exhibits high chemical and electrical stability and belongs to a new structure family of oxide-ion and proton conductors.
Titulo: Oxide-ion and proton conductivity of the ordered perovskite BaY1/3Ga2/3O2.5
